articles.author: Meghan Holohan
articles.title: Man, 37, raises awareness after prostate cancer diagnosis - TODAY
articles.description: Prostate cancer was not on Mical Roy's radar. After a stage 2 aggressive prostate cancer diagnosis, he's raising awareness of it for Black men, reduce shame.
articles.content: During a routine physical exam in 2018, Mical Roys doctor ran a blood test for prostate cancer based on instinct. At the time, Roy was just 37, younger than the average age recommended for screening … [+5771 chars]
